name: Beast
descriptions: Beast is the second of four unique marked men encountered in the Divide in 2281.

Beast is a marauder residing in a small camp east of the High Road entrance. His health and combat skills are higher than those of a normal marked man and are on par with those of a companion. His armor and mask are a crude imitation of Legate Lanius' armor and he wields a shoulder mounted machine gun.
Beast appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Lonesome Road.

Frumentarii: Alerio · Cato Hostilius · Gabban · Karl · Picus · Disguised frumentarius · Ulysses (formerly)
Consul: M. Licinius Crassus · M. Scribonius Libo Drusus (of the consul)
